attributes.action: STOP Durham Police supplying heroin to addicts..
attributes.background: There are children who need cancer drugs & treatment that should surely come before heroin is handed out to self abusing junkies

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the local Police and Crime Commissioner.

You could raise this issue with the Police and Crime Commissioner, who is elected, using the following website:

http://www.durham-pcc.gov.uk/Home.aspx

The Police and Crime Commissioner has made a statement about this issue:

http://www.durham-pcc.gov.uk/News-and-Events/News-Archive/2017/Jan-Mar/Drug-policy-Statement-from-Ron-Hogg.aspx
